Never has a game drawn so much hate from the very bottom of my soul. I hate it so much for what it does to me. This game is FUN, but all that fun is a trap. This game will draw you in and get you addicted, but when you're good and hooked, the servers, smurfs, hackers and toxic players will do everything imaginable to ruin it for you. THE. ANTI-CHEAT. IS. AWFUL. among the worst I've ever experienced. Spinning players come every match or so. No one is safe, the matches where you only get just ONE toxic person ARE A BLESSING. Playing this game and looking for new skins is like being addicted to crack but the only dealer you know only sells you half a teaspoon everyday and if you have the AUDACITY to ask for more, he will pull out a Desert Eagle and pistol whip you in the junk until you are curled up naked on the ground weeping and quivering from the pain, desperation and regret.
This game is one of a kind.
